title: Welcome Deepu to the Group
excerpt: Deepu joins as a PhD student working on light-fueled dynamic covalent systems.
body: We’re delighted to welcome **Deepu George** to the Greenfield Group! Deepu will explore imine-based photoswitches and their integration into out‑of‑equilibrium networks. Expect updates from the lab as the project ramps up.

title: Paper Accepted in Angewandte
excerpt: Our fourth paper establishes design rules for AIP photoswitches.
body: Thrilled to share that our paper on **aryl‑iminopyrazole (AIP)** photoswitches was accepted as a full article. We report the first crystal structure of a metastable Z‑imine and propose general design principles.

title: Lecturer Position at St Andrews
excerpt: Jake will join the School of Chemistry as a permanent Lecturer in Oct 2025.
body: Exciting news: **Jake L. Greenfield** will start as a permanent Lecturer at the University of St Andrews. We’re grateful to collaborators and mentors who supported this journey.
